Meal Finder

About this project

Meal Finder uses TheMealDB API(https://www.themealdb.com/api.php). Uers can search recipes by entering any key terms such as ingredient, way of cooking, category, etc. Detailed ingredients and directions will show up by clicking any recipe cards searched.
